title:
If thou lookest on the lime-leaf,
 Thou a heart's form will discover;
  Therefore are the lindens ever

content: 22  /  30   If thou lookest on the lime-leaf, Thou a heart's form will discover; Therefore are the lindens ever Chosen seats of each fond lover.	by Heinrich Heine Found in Linden Quotes, Share to:
contentWithMarkup:
If thou lookest on the lime-leaf,
 Thou a heart's form will discover;
  Therefore are the lindens ever
   Chosen seats of each fond lover.
